title: Master Cloud Fundamentals with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Kickstart your cloud journey with UNIQ Technologies. Learn Cloud Computing essentials, AWS core services, IAM, storage, compute, networking, and real-time deployment practices. Designed for beginners, freshers, and job seekers aiming to build strong cloud skills with hands-on labs and project-based learning.

afterCompleted.title: Job Opportunities after Cloud Fundamentals Course
afterCompleted.description: Cloud adoption is rapidly growing, creating high demand for skilled cloud professionals across industries. After completing our Cloud Fundamentals course, you can apply for roles such as:

whychoose.title: Beginner-Friendly Training
whychoose.description: Designed for freshers with no prior cloud knowledge. Starts from basics with step-by-step guidance.

whychoose.title: Hands-On AWS Labs
whychoose.description: Work with real AWS services like EC2, S3, IAM, VPC, Lambda, and more.

whychoose.title: Placement-Focused Curriculum
whychoose.description: Get interview questions, real-world scenarios, resume prep, and job support.

whychoose.title: Expert Cloud Engineers as Trainers
whychoose.description: Learn from AWS-certified professionals with 8+ years of industry experience.

whychoose.title: Real-Time Projects
whychoose.description: Deploy applications on AWS using EC2, S3, CloudFront, Lambda, RDS, and more.

whychoose.title: Flexible Batch Timings
whychoose.description: Choose weekday or weekend batches as per your schedule.

whychoose.title: Recognized Certification
whychoose.description: Receive a Cloud Fundamentals Internship Certificate recognized by recruiters.

faq.question: What is the Cloud Fundamentals course?
faq.answer: This course covers the basics of cloud computing, AWS platform, core services like EC2, S3, IAM, and teaches you how cloud infrastructure works in real-time environments.

faq.question: Do I need coding experience?
faq.answer: No. This course is suitable for complete beginners and non-programmers. Everything is taught from scratch.

faq.question: What jobs can I apply for after the course?
faq.answer: Cloud Support Engineer, Cloud Operations Associate, DevOps Trainee, AWS Support Associate, and more entry-level cloud roles.

faq.question: Will I work on real-time AWS services?
faq.answer: Yes. You will work hands-on with EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, VPC, Lambda, CloudWatch, and more.

faq.question: Is this course enough to clear AWS Cloud Practitioner?
faq.answer: Yes. The course covers all topics required for AWS CLF-C02 certification along with practice questions.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes! You will get 100% placement support including mock interviews and daily openings until you get placed.

faq.question: Can I shift from online to offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes, you can switch anytime based on your convenience without any extra charges.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes. You will receive an Internship and Course Completion Certificate from UNIQ Technologies.
